Title: Requires the establishment of a commercial assessment ratio for certain counties
Summary: Requires the establishment of a commercial assessment ratio for a county with a population of more than nine hundred forty-nine thousand, but less than nine hundred fifty thousand.
LawCode: Add ยง1215, amd ยง720, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to creating a county commercial assessment ratio
